description: This file defines the 'Message' class which models IPC messages for a communication service. It includes methods for generating C function prototypes and implementations, Java interface code, and handles encoding/decoding of parameters, as well as referencing external files and symbols related to IPC message handling.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Represents an IPC message with input and output parameters, and methods for generating native C and Java code for IPC handling.

classes.name: CFunction
classes.description: A helper class modeling a C function's name, declaration, and body used during native code generation.

methods.name: compareTo
methods.description: Sorts messages based on their message code.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the message's name.

methods.name: getCode
methods.description: Returns the unique numeric ID of the message.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Returns the message description if set.

methods.name: getInParm
methods.description: Returns the input parameter of the message.

methods.name: getOutParm
methods.description: Returns the output parameter of the message.

methods.name: getReadTimeout
methods.description: Returns the read timeout for the message.

methods.name: supportsC
methods.description: Indicates if C code generation is supported for this message.

methods.name: supportsJava
methods.description: Indicates if Java code generation is supported for this message.

methods.name: calculateNativeFunctions
methods.description: Generates native C functions declarations and implementations for IPC handling.

methods.name: addNativeCodeDefines
methods.description: Adds #define statements for the message to a code formatter table.

methods.name: needsPojoHeader
methods.description: Returns whether a POJO header is needed in native code.

methods.name: getNativeApiFunctionDeclarations
methods.description: Returns the C function declarations for IPC API.

methods.name: getNativeApiFunctionImplementations
methods.description: Returns the C function implementations for IPC API.

methods.name: getNativeHandlerFunctionDeclarations
methods.description: Returns declarations for IPC handler functions.

methods.name: getNativeHandlerFunctionImplementation
methods.description: Returns implementation of IPC handler functions.

methods.name: generateJavaInterface
methods.description: Generates Java interface code for this message.

methods.name: generateJavaCaseLines
methods.description: Generates Java switch-case code for handling IPC message requests.

methods.name: generateDirectJavaCaseLines
methods.description: Generates Java switch-case code for handling direct requests.

methods.name: generateJavaImplementationLines
methods.description: Generates Java abstract method declarations for message handling.
